author: flo (tonebytone)
content:
Gee, my Sigma 90mm 2.8 macro lens doesn't do as good a job as your "cheap" lens did. But perhaps it's because as I get older, I can't hand-hold as steadily as I used to be able to do.

Looks like you've found a great camera at last! Keep letting us know all the things you can do with it.
